title: Proposes a constitutional amendment to allow a district court judge to serve as a family court judge in the judicial district of his or her residence
summary: Proposes a constitutional amendment to allow a district court judge to temporarily serve as a family court judge in the judicial district of his or her residence.
actClause: Concurrent Resolution of the Senate and Assembly proposing an amendment to section 26 of article 6 of the constitution, in relation to authorizing district court judges to serve as family court judges
